# VideoPlayerComponent.SpatialVideoMode

**Enumeration**

Spatial Videos’s rendering mode.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SpatialVideoMode
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **VideoPlayerComponent.SpatialVideoMode.screen**: Video Screen mode - spatial video rending of video as mono/stereo on screen without portal rendering or treatment.
- **VideoPlayerComponent.SpatialVideoMode.spatial**: Spatial rendering mode - head-pose based treatments in portal or in full immersive mode set by the immersiveViewingMode.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
